messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] "Property values"
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/7/00 1:31:38 PM Central Daylight Time, bctswim@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/7/00 1:31:38 PM Central Daylight Time, bctswim@...
writes:

<< all of my neighbors have beautifully decorated homes. i tell
them i am sorry i have made their property values go down...>>
.
Bridget, you crack me up! :) I just came in a little while ago from
working outside in the yard--it took me about 2 hrs, because I had so much to
catch up on, and while I was out there, I was thinking to myself that I
should send a written apology to my neighbors! ha ha! To think that I used
to have several hours a week to spend out in our yard-- amazing how a house
full of little ones changes all of that! :) Hey, btw, I'm glad you're still
on the list! ~Karen
